atk-s0402a29:2_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame pubbeva sambodhāti sambodhito pubbeva,
atk-s0402a29:2_7: Dīpaṅkarassa hi bhagavato pādamūle aṭṭhadhammasamodhānena abhinīhārasamiddhito pabhuti tathāgato sammāsambodhiṁ satto laggo ‘‘pattabbā mayā esā’’ti tadadhigamāya parakkamaṁ amuñcantoyeva āgato, tasmā bodhisattoti vuccati. Ko nu khoti katamo nu kho. Lokoti saṅkhāraloko. Assādoti madhurākāro.
atk-s0402a29:2_9: Tassa mayhanti tassa evaṁ bodhisattasseva sato mayhaṁ.
atk-s0402a29:2_10: Chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānanti nibbānaṁ āgamma ārabbha paṭicca chandarāgo vinayaṁ gacchati pahīyati,
atk-s0402a29:2_12: Idaṁ lokanissaraṇanti idaṁ nibbānaṁ lokato nissaṭattā lokanissaraṇanti vuccati.
atk-s0402a29:2_15: Ñāṇañca pana me dassananti dvīhipi padehi paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṁ vuttaṁ. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0402a29:4_1: Dutiye assādapariyesanaṁ acarinti assādapariyesanatthāya acariṁ. Kuto paṭṭhāyāti? Sumedhakālato paṭṭhāya.
atk-s0402a29:4_3: Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo. Tatiyaṁ sabbattha uttānameva.
atk-s0402a29:6_1: Catutthe sāmaññatthanti catubbidhaṁ ariyaphalaṁ. Itaraṁ tasseva vevacanaṁ.
atk-s0402a29:6_4: Imesu pana catūsupi suttesu khandhalokova kathito.
atk-s0402a29:8_1: Pañcamaṁ atthuppattiyā nikkhittaṁ. Katarāya atthuppattiyā? Chabbaggiyānaṁ anācāre.
atk-s0402a29:8_2: Te kira gāyantā naccantā hasantā vicariṁsu.
atk-s0402a29:8_4: Satthā te pakkosāpetvā tesaṁ ovādatthāya idaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi. Tattha ruṇṇanti roditaṁ. Ummattakanti ummattakakiriyā.
atk-s0402a29:8_6: Dantavidaṁsakahasitanti dante dassetvā pāṇiṁ paharantānaṁ mahāsaddena hasitaṁ.
atk-s0402a29:8_7: Setughāto gīteti gīte vo paccayaghāto hotu,
atk-s0402a29:8_8: sahetukaṁ gītaṁ pajahathāti dīpeti. Naccepi eseva nayo. Alanti yuttaṁ.
atk-s0402a29:8_9: Dhammappamoditānaṁ satanti ettha dhammo vuccati kāraṇaṁ,
atk-s0402a29:8_11: Sitaṁ sitamattāyāti tasmiṁ sitakāraṇe sati yaṁ sitaṁ karotha,
atk-s0402a29:8_12: taṁ vo sitamattāya aggadante dassetvā pahaṭṭhākāramattadassanāyayeva yuttanti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a29:10_1: Paṭisevanāya natthi tittīti yathā yathā paṭisevati,
atk-s0402a29:10_2: tathā tathā ruccatiyevāti titti nāma natthi. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a29:10_3: Sace hi mahāsamudde udakaṁ surā bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a29:10_5: tassa tattha carantassapi sayantassapi titti nāma na bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a29:12_2: Na bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hotīti apāye paṭisandhipaccayatāya na laddhakaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a29:12_4: Sukkapakkhe sagge paṭisandhipaccayatāya bhaddakaṁ hoti laddhakaṁ.
atk-s0402a29:12_5: Taṁ pana ekantena sotāpannādīnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ ariyasāvakānaṁyeva vaṭṭati. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0402a29:16_3: Taṁ kammaṁ kammasamudayāya saṁvattatīti taṁ kammaṁ aññesampi vaṭṭagāmikammānaṁ samudayāya piṇḍakaraṇatthāya saṁvattati.
atk-s0402a29:16_4: Na taṁ kammaṁ kammanirodhāyāti taṁ pana kammaṁ vaṭṭagāmikammānaṁ nirodhatthāya na saṁvattati.
atk-s0402a29:18_3: Ārabbhāti āgamma sandhāya paṭicca. Chandoti taṇhāchando.
atk-s0402a29:18_4: Yo cetaso sārāgoti yo cittassa rāgo rajjanā rajjitattaṁ, etamahaṁ saṁyojanaṁ vadāmi, bandhanaṁ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0402a29:18_7: Yadā vā tena vipāko ñāto hoti vidito,
atk-s0402a29:18_8: tadā te ceva dhamme tañca vipākaṁ abhinivatteti.
atk-s0402a29:18_12: Paññāya ativijjha passatīti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya nibbijjhitvā passati.
